long_description: Made for all-day, everyday wearability, the women's Smith Lyric polarized sunglasses combine nostalgic style with modern refinement and dependable, sun-blocking performance. Polarized lenses reduce 99% of visible glare for increased sharpness and decreased eye fatigue. Lightweight and virtually shatterproof, injection-molded polycarbonate lenses are twenty times more impact resistant than glass and one-third the weight. Black frames feature gray-tint lenses, ideal for bright days and direct sunlight. Tortoise frames feature brown-tint lenses that enhance your vision in a wide range of light and weather conditions. 53% bio-based Evolve frames are made with Rilsan(R) Clear, a light, durable, non-petroleum-based material derived from renewable, non-GMO castor plants. Hydrophilic Megol nose pads become tackier when wet for reliable grip during exercise and hot weather.
short_description: Made for all-day, everyday wearability, the women's Smith Lyric polarized sunglasses combine nostalgic style with modern refinement and dependable, sun-blocking performance.
